name: Memorious
description:
I had real big plans for this and got permission to make it and everything but I only got as far as moving bits around. There's no menu, so alt-f4 to exit. skybox courtesy NASA I think? it's been a minute

controls:

wasd to move, space to ascend, c to descend

click and drag to move modules around

also I'm pretty sure there's no save state so make sure to grab screencaps of yr configuration if u come up with something you like

included are some docs for a twitter bot, some proposed UI, and some png's of the mirage, feel free to use those for whatever

anyway thanks to Friends at the Table for making a cool podcast and to Manifesto Jam for convincing me to post sketches bc those can be cool sometimes too
